mapper.select:
select rownum, n.* from( select s.std_brd_no, s.ref_member_id, s.ref_lecture_no, s.std_brd_title, s.std_brd_content, s.std_brd_date, s.std_brd_count, l.lecture_name from study_board s join lecture l on s.ref_lecture_no = l.lecture_No order by STD_BRD_NO asc) n
and ${searchType} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
order by rownum desc

select * from (select s.std_brd_no, s.ref_member_id, s.ref_lecture_no, s.std_brd_title, s.std_brd_content, s.std_brd_date, s.std_brd_count, l.lecture_name from study_board s join lecture l on s.ref_lecture_no = l.lecture_No ) n where n.std_brd_no = #{stdBrdNo}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO study_board( std_brd_no, ref_member_id, ref_lecture_no, std_brd_title, std_brd_content, std_brd_date, std_brd_count ) values( SEQ_STD_BRD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{refMemberId}, #{refLectureNo}, #{stdBrdTitle}, #{stdBrdContent}, default, 0 )
select SEQ_STD_BRD_NO.currval from dual
mapper.update: update study_board set std_brd_no = #{stdBrdNo}, ref_member_id = #{refMemberId}, ref_lecture_no = #{refLectureNo}, std_brd_title = #{stdBrdTitle}, std_brd_content = #{stdBrdContent} where std_brd_no = #{stdBrdNo}
update study_board set std_brd_count = std_brd_count+1 where std_brd_no = #{stdBrdNo}
mapper.select: select a.*, c.contents_attach_path from attachment a JOIN contents_group c ON a.ref_contents_group_code = c.contents_group_code where a.ref_contents_no = #{stdBrdNo} and a.ref_contents_group_code = 'SB'
mapper.delete: delete from attachment where ref_contents_no = #{stdBrdNo} and ref_contents_group_code = 'SB'
mapper.select: select lecture_name from lecture where lecture_no = #{lectureNo}
